metadata.project_name: Substrate Phase 7: UX Refinement and Delivery

work_areas.title: UX Foundation
work_areas.description: Establish the new root UI structure and validate the Next.js delivery path.

work_areas.title: Governance Integration
work_areas.description: Integrate the governance CLI and state reporting into the new Next.js UI.

packets.title: Establish Root UI Structure
packets.scope: Move active UX to root /ui directory, update package.json, and verify development server startup. Output: Functional Next.js app in /ui.

packets.title: Validate Delivery Path
packets.scope: Verify build, lint, and typecheck commands for the new UI structure. Output: Successful 'npm run build' in /ui.
